graph_title: Percentage of cafeterias on campus that offer a menu with local and seasonal products and also have fair trade products over the total number of said establishments
indicator_name: Percentage of cafeterias on campus that offer a menu with local and seasonal products and also have fair trade products over the total number of said establishments
SDG_GOAL: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
SDG_TARGET: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
SDG_INDICATOR: Percentage of cafeterias on campus that offer a menu with local and seasonal products and also have fair trade products over the total number of said establishments
indicator_level: Process (offer information about the effort, resources, decisions and actions that the UPO is making to comply with the SDG)
